achievements.title: Deans list
achievements.div: The University of Scranton Dean's List: A student must have a grade point average of 3.5 or better with a minimum number of credit hours to make the Dean's List. More Info: Click Me

achievements.title: Student Affairs Recognition
achievements.div: Recognition for outstanding leadership and contributions to the students and staff at the University of Scranton. More Info: Click Me

achievements.title: ACM International Collegiate Programming Contest 2012
achievements.div: Honorable mention at the Wilkes University ACM Regional contest. More Info: Click Me

achievements.title: Student Representative on Learning Mangement Working Group
achievements.div: In October, 2011 IT Development and Applications (ITDA) began working with the Center for Teaching and Learning Excellence (CTLE) to formulate a plan to establish an LMS Evaluation Working Group, with a purpose of evaluating alternatives to ANGEL and select our institution's next learning management system. More Info: Click Me

achievements.title: Neal J. Fasula Award
achievements.div: Gerrity's Supermarkets, the Fasula family and the Scranton Area Foundation are pleased to announce the 2013 Neal J. Fasula Scholarship Fund. Neal J. Fasula was owner of Gerrity's Supermarkets for nearly 30 years. This scholarship was created in his memory to honor his contributions to the food industry and to the employees of Gerrity's Supermarkets. More Info: Click Me

achievements.title: Teammate of the Year
achievements.div: West Scranton Baseball teammate of the year award. This award is given to a player who shows true team spirit and is always there on and off the field for their teammates.

achievements.title: Front Page of Reddit
achievements.div: Made it to the front page of the internet also known as reddit. More Info: Click Me
